mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.swyt_dlzh AS "swytDlzh", a.swyt_dlmm AS "swytDlmm", a.yh_ref_owid AS "yhRefOwid", a.sfzzm AS "sfzzm", a.sfzfm AS "sfzfm", a.hjzm AS "hjzm", a.xm AS "xm", a.sfzh AS "sfzh", a.csrq AS "csrq", a.zzmm AS "zzmm", a.jdxy AS "jdxy", a.mz AS "mz", a.xjdq AS "xjdq", a.xb AS "xb", a.jtzz AS "jtzz", a.yb AS "yb", a.lxdh AS "lxdh", a.area AS "area", a.city AS "city", a.prov AS "prov", a.grsg AS "grsg", a.grtz AS "grtz", a.grsl AS "grsl", a.yx AS "yx", a.qq AS "qq", a.tcah AS "tcah", a.grzp AS "grzp", a.kslb AS "kslb", a.wyyz AS "wyyz", a.yzmc AS "yzmc", a.wycj AS "wycj", a.zxlb AS "zxlb", a.jssm AS "jssm", a.jsfj AS "jsfj", a.qtqk AS "qtqk", a.xk_state AS "xkState", a.hk_state AS "hkState", a.jtcy_state AS "jtcyState", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10", a.creator AS "creator", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state"
mapper.update: UPDATE BCKJ_BIZ_YHXX SET SW_MM = #{swMm} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select:
SELECT a.owid AS "owid", a.xk_state AS "xkState", a.state AS "state", a.hk_state AS "hkState", a.jtcy_state AS "jtcyState" FROM bckj_biz_jbxx a
a.yh_ref_owid=#{yhRefOwid}
select a.xb AS "xb",a.xm AS "xm",a.sw_zh AS "lxdh",a.prov AS "prov",a.city AS "city", a.area AS "area" FROM bckj_biz_yhxx a where a.owid=#{yhRefOwid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_jbxx( owid, swyt_dlzh, swyt_dlmm, yh_ref_owid , sfzzm, sfzfm, hjzm, xm, sfzh, csrq, zzmm, jdxy, mz, xjdq, xb, jtzz, yb, lxdh, area, city, prov, grsg, grtz, grsl, yx, qq, tcah, grzp, kslb, wyyz, yzmc, wycj, zxlb, jssm, jsfj, qtqk, xk_state, hk_state, jtcy_state, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10, creator, createtime, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{swytDlzh}, #{swytDlmm}, #{yhRefOwid}, #{sfzzm}, #{sfzfm}, #{hjzm}, #{xm}, #{sfzh}, #{csrq}, #{zzmm}, #{jdxy}, #{mz}, #{xjdq}, #{xb}, #{jtzz}, #{yb}, #{lxdh}, #{area}, #{city}, #{prov}, #{grsg}, #{grtz}, #{grsl}, #{yx}, #{qq}, #{tcah}, #{grzp}, #{kslb}, #{wyyz}, #{yzmc}, #{wycj}, #{zxlb}, #{jssm}, #{jsfj}, #{qtqk}, #{xkState}, #{hkState}, #{jtcyState}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10}, #{creator}, #{createtime}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_jbxx SET owid = #{owid}, swyt_dlzh =#{swytDlzh}, swyt_dlmm =#{swytDlmm}, yh_ref_owid= #{yhRefOwid}, sfzzm = #{sfzzm}, sfzfm = #{sfzfm}, hjzm = #{hjzm}, xm = #{xm}, sfzh = #{sfzh}, csrq = #{csrq}, zzmm = #{zzmm}, jdxy = #{jdxy}, mz = #{mz}, xjdq = #{xjdq}, xb = #{xb}, jtzz = #{jtzz}, yb = #{yb}, lxdh = #{lxdh}, area = #{area}, city = #{city}, prov = #{prov}, grsg = #{grsg}, grtz = #{grtz}, grsl = #{grsl}, yx = #{yx}, qq = #{qq}, tcah = #{tcah}, grzp = #{grzp}, kslb = #{kslb}, wyyz = #{wyyz}, yzmc = #{yzmc}, wycj = #{wycj}, zxlb = #{zxlb}, jssm = #{jssm}, jsfj = #{jsfj}, qtqk = #{qtqk}, xk_state = #{xkState}, hk_state = #{hkState}, jtcy_state = #{jtcyState}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10}, creator = #{creator}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state} WHERE owid = #{owid}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) from bckj_biz_yhxx a where a.yhlx =3
